title: technofest`2k10
description:
The official website for technofest`2k10 a national level technical fest organised at VR Siddhartha Engineering College. As worked on the landing page of the website and the Department of CSE website.

As key member in the organising committee, I developed the website for the festival. This was my first ever website that was made public.

In 2010 its a trend that people give two versions of a same website in form of HTML and Flash. I worked on the html website by taking a base free template. The Flash website was from the free theme `supernove` a Flash and XML customisable template.

previousProject.description:
Infinito is an Intradepartmental TechnoCultural Fest conducted in out college, it was initiated by our seniors they called it as skill launch they conducted only technical and management events. We added cultural events. I am the main coordinator of that, along with my friend subhash we both planed it first and with the help of our friends we organised the event successfully.

This web site was done for that event, its just a JqueryUI theme black and brown and just a jquery popup and carousel.

This site was developed just in one day. As we have very less time to do all the things.
